page.title: 11LOCAL CLUBS IN DRUMNADROCHIT
page.content: {Drumnadrochit}has many clubs for older people.On a Monday and a Thursday night during the winter there is {badminton}in the local hall.On a Wednesday night there is{Shinty training involving the players of our two Glenurquhart teams,who play most Saturdays during the winter. In the summer there is{Bowling}on the local green for the elderly.On a Tuesday night there is{football}in the playing field. At{Borlum Farm}there is a riding for the Disabled group.Many local people help lead the horses round the specially constucted building.The disabled folk come mainly from Inverness. Other local clubs and societies which meet regulary are The Womens Guild,Womens Rural Institute,and the{Sea Angling {Club}which arranges fishing trips to the West coast throughout the year.
